appSkuName.description: The name of the compute instance running the server. Also see appSkuTier

appSkuTier.description: The tier of the compute instance running the server. Also see appSkuName

filePath.description: The relative file path to the folder containing web files.

containerPublicAccess.description: The public access level of the BlobContainer containg the website data.

storageSkuName.description: The name of the SKU of the storage account created, if storageAccount is not provided

storageAccount.description: The storage account to use. One will be created if not provided.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group to use. One will be created if not provided.

namePrefix.description: The name prefix given to child resources of this component. Should not contain dashes.
